channel.title: Comments on: Happy Valenniversary to Me!

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/happy-valenniversary-to-me/#comment-981">jadescastle</a>.
LOL! Thank you. It's wonderful to love my life again. Let me go and self-administer a chocolate treat now! :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to jadescastle.

LOL! Thank you. It’s wonderful to love my life again. Let me go and self-administer a chocolate treat now! :)

item.title: By: jadescastle
item.dc:creator: jadescastle
item.description: You are such a beautiful creature. i'm glad you found the one true love you that will always have your back. And i hope you bought her a big box of chocolates. :)
item.content:encoded: You are such a beautiful creature. i’m glad you found the one true love you that will always have your back. And i hope you bought her a big box of chocolates. :)
